publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1859 Margaret Jamieson: Health Awards at HM Prison Kilmarnock—That the Parliament congratulates HM Prison Kilmarnock on its achievement of two important awards, the British Council 5 Star Award for Health and Safety and the Bronze SHAW (Scotland’s Health at Work) Award and notes that this recognises the commitment of the staff of HM Prison Kilmarnock to the highest standards of health and safety within the establishment.
S2M-1859 Health Awards at HM Prison Kilmarnock (lodged on 15 October 2004) Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-1859 Health Awards at HM Prison Kilmarnock (lodged on 15 October 2004) Sarah Boyack*, Jackie Baillie*
S2M-1859 Health Awards at HM Prison Kilmarnock (lodged on 15 October 2004) Trish Godman*, Scott Barrie*, Janis Hughes*
